com.revolsys.orm.hibernate.dao
Class HibernateQueryPager<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.revolsys.orm.hibernate.dao.HibernateQueryPager<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResultPager<T>
public class HibernateQueryPager<T>
extends Object
implements ResultPager<T>

The HibernateQueryPager is an implementation of ResultPager that allows paging over a Hibernate Query.

Author:
Paul Austin
